EXTENSION_NAME.message: SMS Text Message Scheduler for Google Voice™

EXTENSION_DESCRIPTION.message: Schedule your Google Voice™ SMS text messages to be sent in the future!

ERROR_RECIPIENTS_MISSING.description: Error message when user does not provide enough recipients.

ERROR_RECIPIENTS_OVERLIMIT.description: Error message when user provides too many recipients.

ERROR_MESSAGE_TEXT_MISSING.description: Error message when user does not provide message text.

ERROR_MESSAGE_TEXT_OVERLIMIT.message: - Google Voice text limit at 320 characters.
ERROR_MESSAGE_TEXT_OVERLIMIT.description: Error message when user-provided message text is over the character limit.

ERROR_DATETIME_PAST.message: - Scheduled message date and time must be in the future.
ERROR_DATETIME_PAST.description: Error message when user schedules message for a date and time in the past.

WARNING_CONFIRM_CLEAR.message: Are you sure you want to clear all scheduled SMS messages? This cannot be undone!
WARNING_CONFIRM_CLEAR.description: Warning message when user is about to clear all scheduled messages.

WARNING_CONFIRM_REMOVE.message: Are you sure you want to remove this scheduled SMS message? This cannot be undone!
WARNING_CONFIRM_REMOVE.description: Warning message when user is about to remove a scheduled message.

WARNING_CONFIRM_SEND.message: Are you sure you want to send this scheduled SMS message now? This cannot be undone!
WARNING_CONFIRM_SEND.description: Warning message when user is about to send a scheduled message early.

STATUS_NO_MESSAGES.description: Status message when there are no scheduled messages to display.

ERROR_MISSING_MESSAGE.description: Error message when a process could not find a message it was supposed to.

ERROR_INVALID_INPUT.description: Error message when a process receives invalid data.

ERROR_API_ISSUE.message: Could not retrieve data from Google Voice!
ERROR_API_ISSUE.description: Error message when a process cannot make request to API calls.

ERROR_MISSING_KEY.message: Couldn't load account key! Will try again in a minute, or try reloading the extension.
ERROR_MISSING_KEY.description: Userfacing message when account key could not be loaded.
